name: Brave River
description: Located in Warwick, RI, Brave River Solutions provides leading technology solutions to businesses in the Providence and Boston areas. With over 20 years of industry experience and unique end-to-end service capabilities, we offer consulting services, eBusiness solutions (including website design & development), and IT support. Brave River partners with our clients to create solutions that enhance their productivity and efficiency through state-of-the-art technology.
